product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Mini Tablet Crossbody Bag - Women's
long_description: While it holds your mini tablet or e-reader, the women's Eagle Creek RFID Mini Tablet Crossbody Bag also helps prevent identity theft and doubles as a clutch purse. What's not to like?. RFID-blocking technology integrated into the credit card pocket helps protect your personal information from illicit RFID scanning. Adjustable 55 in. shoulder strap offers close-to-body security; removes so you can use bag as a clutch. Exterior back zippered pocket holds items you want kept handy, such as a phone or wallet. Front zippered pocket with 2 elasticized slip pockets organize small items. Pocket for mini tablet is lined with e-fleece; also has 2 zippered passport pockets and 8 credit card slots. The women's Eagle Creek RFID Mini Tablet Crossbody Bag has s zip-around closure to keep contents secure.
short_description: While it holds your mini tablet or e-reader, the women's Eagle Creek RFID Mini Tablet Crossbody Bag also helps prevent identity theft and doubles as a clutch purse. What's not to like?.
